capability.name: Cheque Processing
capability.definition: Handle the processing of paper cheques, generating financial transactions for processing
capability.role: This service domains handles the processing of paper checks, performing the necessary checks and extracting the transaction details required to create a payment transaction record stream. This includes MICR number processing and character recognition facilities
capability.example: A batch of paper cheques captured at a merchant location is processed to initiate settlement processing

key_features.name: Paper cheque scanning and content verification
key_features.description: Enables paper cheque scanning and content verification to support handle the processing of paper cheques, generating financial transactions for processing

key_features.name: Cancelled cheque identification
key_features.description: Enables cancelled cheque identification to support handle the processing of paper cheques, generating financial transactions for processing

key_features.name: Financial transaction generation
key_features.description: Enables financial transaction generation to support handle the processing of paper cheques, generating financial transactions for processing
